title: A brand new music experience
notSupported: Sorry, muffon is not supported by your system.
description:
muffon is a cross-platform music streaming browser
for desktop, which helps you find, listen
and organize music in a way you've probably
never experienced before

listen.subheader: With 7 audio sources, fallback source option, song variants, queue and equalizer

search.subheader: All of music search engines just in one window

radio.subheader: Tune in to artist, tag or charts stations

videos.subheader: With video variants, channels, playlists and related videos

tags.subheader: Explore your favorite genres or discover new ones

releases.subheader: Track new or upcoming albums of your favorite artists

multitag.subheader: Combine multiple tags to find what exactly matches your taste

customize.subheader: Enable dark mode, select background or change transparency

library.subheader: Import it from Last.FM, your computer or from search and get your compatibility with others

recommendations.subheader: With filtering by library artists and tags

scrobble.subheader: Keep recording your Last.FM listening history

favorites.subheader: For quick access to your liked ones

listened.subheader: To always know that you've already listened to something

share.subheader: Send links to music, videos, playlists and more

post.subheader: Tell the world about something or share something cool you've found

message.subheader: Chat with people of your music taste

feed.subheader: Get news from your subscriptions or global updates

communities.subheader: Create and join various fan groups
